name: Macro
desc: Select a macro to record or play!

name: Record
desc: Records the gameplay to be played back. (This will reset the current inputs if you play a level and have a macro selected.)

name: Macro Editor
desc: Enter the macro editor. (Will not work properly with Record enabled)

name: Frame Fix
desc: Records the players every movement, including position when recording and playing back a macro. Do note that this option will increase the file size of the macro while recording.

name: Fixed FPS
desc: Locks the frames to the target framerate of the macro. This may look like the "smooth fix" option is enabled if the game is lagging.
